nodes.text: Sarlee Jax was a female individual associated with the smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca. While at the bar Urrett's Marque on the planet Coruscant, Jax provided Solo with information about the Aloo family.
Sarlee Jax was first mentioned in the canon junior novel The Mighty Chewbacca in the Forest of Fear!, which was written by Tom Angleberger and published in 2018.
